mapper.select: select ci.class_num,ci.ml_num,ci.pro_num,ci.tutor_nickname,ci.class_address,ci.class_form, ci.class_max,ci.class_min,ci.class_title,ci.class_price,ci.class_hour,ci.class_count, ci.class_target,ci.class_about,ci.tutor_about,ci.tutor_phone,ci.scategory_num, ( select b.bcategory_num from big_category b, small_category s where b.bcategory_num=s.bcategory_num and s.scategory_num=ci.scategory_num )bcategory_num , loc.sloc_name,loc.bloc_name FROM class_info ci, ( select sloc_num, sloc_name, bloc_name from small_location s, big_location b where s.bloc_num=b.bloc_num )loc where loc.sloc_num=ci.sloc_num and ci.class_num=#{class_num}

SELECT cover.cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cover.class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img cover,class_info ci where cover.class_num=ci.class_num and cover.class_num=#{class_num}

select count(*) cnt,ci.class_num,ci.ml_num,ci.pro_num,ci.tutor_nickname,ci.class_address,ci.class_form, ci.class_title,ci.class_price,ci.scategory_num, loc.sloc_name,loc.bloc_name, class_date, cover_num FROM class_info ci,
( select sloc_num, sloc_name, bloc_name from small_location s, big_location b where s.bloc_num=b.bloc_num )loc,
( select count(class_num) cnt, class_num from wishlist group by class_num )w,
class_date cd, ( SELECT class_num , cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img group by class_num ) cover where loc.sloc_num=ci.sloc_num and w.class_num=ci.class_num and cd.class_num=w.class_num and cover.class_num=ci.class_num and class_auth=2 and class_status=0 group by class_num order by cnt desc limit 0,8
